text: Ruguo nimen bu xiangzhu ta, namo, zhenzhu que yi xiangzhu tale. Dangshi, buxindao de renmen ba ta quzhu chujing, zhiyou yige ren yu ta tongxing, dangshi, ta lia zai shandong li, ta dui ta de tongban shuo: Buyao youchou, zhenzhu que shi he women zai yiqi de. Zhenzhu jiu ba ningjing jiang gei ta, erqie yi nimen suo kan bujian de jundui fuzhu ta, bingqie shi bu xindao zhe de yanci bian cheng zui beijian de; er zhenzhu de yanci que shi zuigao shang de. Zhenzhu shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de.
